feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Added non editable credentials accounts, for creating demo account (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/56b5b61a82b8165aa7ec41b0468b6669ec94b9dc)

Fixes

  • Fixed default layout can be overwritten even if value is not valid (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7ac2b3f3605d4c9475c5ae4b72b8d7c921fcf4fa)
  • Fixed search page not redirecting correctly after submitting track form (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5e904492943b80363c98731c052ac664066ab836)
  • Fixed potential database lock when updating episode watch date (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/aed9cc7ef3d1a5ce3c699cc68079578aef6fd17a)
  • Fixes errors that may occur when handling multiple requests when changing progress from home page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5fabaaa01bb378d1cec72af877b268a36b87a562)

Other

  • Removed help text for username and password change (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5ce47271d0a7f03c1270c95b5daa581bf2b4633e)
  • Removed some password requirements (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6eeea5c3f74b86254024814a5b240faa40ef4f96)
  • Use ruff as formatter (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5bb47c6300fd94793f7244d31894eacc0931b9f8)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.2.1 to 0.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/112
  • Bump django-crispy-forms from 2.0 to 2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/111
  • Bump requests-cache from 1.1.1 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/110
  • Bump psycopg-binary from 3.1.17 to 3.1.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/108
  • Bump django-debug-toolbar from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/109
  • Bump coverage from 7.4.1 to 7.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/116
  • Bump libsass from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/115
  • Bump django-model-utils from 4.3.1 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.7...v0.7.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Cache processed data from external APIs (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/dd004fd218f0ac6b776c4cb3ed245e2b61617878)
  • Added brotli for better content compression (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7633ad4f5102df0ffc160db950011adbd111c69e)
  • Optimized data importing (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/8197161be64df80bdbdee2319b3dea7a75601b92)
  • Added additional data to media descriptions (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/fb2c1adf546a7cdfc873186c995694ee6382bca8)
  • Added better empty states (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/dd0dd8177762c175eb74b6bc8f373fe23f0e724d)

Fixes

  • Fixed errors when saving media with unknown total episodes (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/ce143e6ad81cbc8302fe6e5f51d7b768992c7688)
  • Fixed crashes caused by medias with non-latin titles (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/71457c1c2cac7affee05fc1ed8637ab673fd64b9)

Other

  • Update default PostgreSQL version to v16 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b887d7510564a1912e666e3cf266c746dd9d1454)
  • Hide asterisk for required fields in forms (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c721e8c536c989e1ad17ac505d903f5518fed567)
  • Changed to default session expiry age (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/cc69e3789cd12bf9d56d69ea3db8a72bc2f7f03d)
  • Use default bootstrap dark theme (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/60f18f9df512918b274ea1e7c80663df87400274)

Maintenance

  • Bump django from 5.0.2 to 5.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/120
  • Bump ruff from 0.2.2 to 0.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/119
  • Bump crispy-bootstrap5 from 2023.10 to 2024.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/118
  • Bump ruff from 0.3.0 to 0.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/125
  • Bump coverage from 7.4.2 to 7.4.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/124
  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.0.2 to 5.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/123

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.7.1...v0.8

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Added default API keys (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7732815322b8efe606162c2cf0f38ecf1a2fc226)

Fixes

  • Fixed psycopg package name(https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6c0eaed0f1b44f57f9fb94b1bc011c9eaa1ff186)

Other

  • Smaller media grid items (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/59842924962984c116b4e7b73a6a58032de58c06)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Features

  • Added demo instance at yamtrack.fuzzygrim.com (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a25403909fb5be433a90c307395af44caa920e2a)

Fixes

  • Fixed sorting order with null items when using PostgreSQL (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7a4e32f779228e5737c6f775d9271f1d47de5fc4)
  • Fixed episode image stretching (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6f70cef8f2d2e966b6691e7af88d6d8259b5297b)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.3
entry.content:
Feature

  • Added environment variables for toggling nsfw searches

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3
